summary: The module contains a suite of asynchronous unit tests that exercise the OpenAI API wrapper across multiple endpoints—including chat completion, text completion, embeddings, image generation, and moderation—verifying correct request handling, response parsing, header propagation, rate‑limit behavior, streaming support, and proxy configuration.
business_intent: Ensure the OpenAI integration functions reliably and meets expected behavior under various scenarios, preventing regressions and guaranteeing correct handling of different request types and configurations.
